name: Balor Whip
text: You can drag distant foes toward you with your whip.
prerequisites: Weapon Focus (whip), Whip Mastery, base attack bonus +8.
benefit: When you perform a drag combat maneuver with your whip, you can choose not to move with your target, instead bringing your target closer to you. If you do this, you can’t drag the target any farther than the distance it takes to move it adjacent to you, even if your result was high enough to drag the target farther. You gain a +2 bonus on drag combat maneuver checks when using a whip to drag, but this bonus doesn’t stack with the bonus from Improved Drag.
special: Balor Whip counts as Improved Drag for the purpose of qualifying for Quick Drag.
text_zh: 你可以用鞭子把远方的敌人拉过来。
prerequisites_zh: 武器专攻（长鞭），长鞭熟稔，BAB+8。
benefit_zh: 当你用鞭子进行拖拽战技时，你可以选择不和目标一起移动，而是让你的目标离你更近。如果你这么做，你拖拽目标的最大距离为你与目标之间的距离，即使你的检定结果足够高，可以将目标拖拽得更远。当你使用鞭子进行拖拽战技时，你在拖拽战技检定上获得+2加值，这个加值与精通拖拽给予的加值不叠加。
special_zh: 巴洛炎魔之鞭可视为精通拖拽ACG以满足快速拖拽UC的先决条件。
